content: Nov 13 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 1045 GMT on Monday:
name: Equity Commonwealth
title: Deals of the day-Mergers and acquisitions

content: Equity Commonwealth   a U.S. real estate investment trust (REIT) focused on office space and chaired by property mogul Sam Zell  has approached Forest City Realty Trust Inc  to discuss a possible merger  people familiar with the matter said.
name: Equity Commonwealth
title: Exclusive: Equity Commonwealth approaches Forest City about merging - sources

title: BRIEF-Equity Commonwealth says has 7 properties totaling 4.7 mln square feet in various stages of sale process​

content: Aug 14 Corvex Management threatened a proxy battle against Energen Corp if the U.S. oil and gas producer did not agree to add the activist investor's nominees to its board.
name: Equity Commonwealth
title: UPDATE 1-Corvex warns of proxy fight with Energen after raising stake

content: Stocks slated to deliver large gains in 2017 range from movie-theater chain AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc  to two companies with ties to billionaire Sam Zell - Equity Commonwealth  and Real Industry Inc   Barron's said in a report.
name: Equity Commonwealth
title: AMC Entertainment  Equity Commonwealth are stocks to watch: Barron's
